thread.title: Come Get Your First Look At Bryan Cranston As Zordon In The POWER RANGERS Movie
thread.title_full: Come Get Your First Look At Bryan Cranston As Zordon In The POWER RANGERS Movie

author: Rohan Patel
title: Come Get Your First Look At Bryan Cranston As Zordon In The POWER RANGERS Movie
text:
The Power Rangers reboot is swiftly approaching, but Lionsgate doesn't seem to be the least bit fazed as outside of the initial trailer, they've hardly released anything official from the highly anticipated Dean Israelite -directed movie.
Instead of debuting fresh stills or footage over the past few weeks, we've instead (somewhat oddly) been treated to merchandise images, which have revealed the Dinozords, the Megazord, Alpha 5, Goldar, and the Putty Patrollers. However, it looks like our luck might just be on the verge of turning around as the latest "leaked" photo seems to be from the actual movie and could be one of the most accurate things we've seen from the film to date.
The photo in question, which originated on Reddit , seemingly reveals our first look at Primetime Emmy-winner Bryan Cranston ( Breaking Bad ) as the Rangers' wise mentor/guardian Zordon overseeing what is presumably the Command Center and just like his television counterpart, he's once again a giant floating head. Alpha 5 also features in the bottom left corner standing in front of a console.
The photo's exact origin is uncertain, but it's said to be taken from the Power Rangers Movie virtual reality experience at the International Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas.
Check out the photo below:
 Saban's Power Rangers follows five ordinary high school kids who must become something extraordinary when they learn that their small town of Angel Grove – and the world – is on the verge of being obliterated by an alien threat. Chosen by destiny, our heroes quickly discover that they are the only ones who can save the planet. But to do so they will have to overcome their real-life issues and band together as the Power Rangers before it is too late.
Power Rangers features:
Director: Dean Israelite
Dacre Montgomery as Jason Lee Scott, the Red Ranger
Naomi Scott as Kimberly Hart, the Pink Ranger
Ludi Lin as Zack Taylor, the Black Ranger
RJ Cyler as Billy Cranston, the Blue Ranger
Becky Gomez as Trini Kwan, the Yellow Ranger
Elizabeth Banks as Rita Repulsa
Bryan Cranston as Zordon
Bill Hader as Alpha 5
David Denman as Sam Scott
Anjali Jay as Maddy Hart
Emily Maddison as Rebecca
Patrick Sabongui as Mr. Kwan
Lisa Berry as Candace Cranston
Caroline Cave as Beverly Scott
Kayden Magnuson as Pearl Scott
Sarah Grey as Amanda
The Power Rangers say it's morphin' time once again March 24, 2017
